verses.verse: <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> he <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G2584>Capernaum<s%>, <S%G1223>after<s%> some <S%G2250>days<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> it was <S%G191>noised<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he <S%G2076>was<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> the <S%G3624>house<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2112>straightway<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> were gathered <S%G4863>together<s%>, insomuch <S%G5620>that<s%> there <S%G5562>was<s%> <S%G3371>no<s%> room to <S%G5562>receive<s%> them, no, not so <S%G3366>much<s%> as <S%G4314>about<s%> the <S%G2374>door<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G2980>preached<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> they <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G5342>bringing<s%> one sick of the <S%G3885>palsy<s%>, which was <S%G142>borne<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G5064>four<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> when they <S%G1410>could<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> come <S%G4331>nigh<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> the <S%G3793>press<s%>, they <S%G648>uncovered<s%> the <S%G4721>roof<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> he <S%G2258>was<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> when they had broken it <S%G1846>up<s%>, they let <S%G5465>down<s%> the <S%G2895>bed<s%> <S%G1909%G3739>wherein<s%> the sick of the <S%G3885>palsy<s%> <S%G2621>lay<s%>.

<S%G1161>When<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>, he <S%G3004>said<s%> unto the sick of the <S%G3885>palsy<s%>, Son <S%G5043><s%> , thy <S%G4675><s%> sins <S%G266><s%> be forgiven <S%G863><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%> .

<S%G1161>But<s%> there <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> of the <S%G1122>scribes<s%> <S%G2521>sitting<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1260>reasoning<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%>,

<S%G5101>Why<s%> <S%G2980>doth<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> man <S%G3779>thus<s%> <S%G2980>speak<s%> <S%G988>blasphemies<s%>? <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G863>forgive<s%> <S%G266>sins<s%> <S%G1508>but<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1520>only<s%>?

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2112>immediately<s%> when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1921>perceived<s%> in <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> they <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G1260>reasoned<s%> <S%G1722>within<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%>, he <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, Why <S%G5101><s%> reason ye <S%G1260><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%> ?

Whether <S%G5101><s%> is it <S%G2076><s%> easier <S%G2123><s%> to say <S%G2036><s%> to the sick of the palsy <S%G3885><s%> , Thy sins <S%G266><s%> be forgiven <S%G863><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%> ; or <S%G2228><s%> to say <S%G2036><s%> , Arise <S%G1453><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> take up <S%G142><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> bed <S%G2895><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> walk <S%G4043><s%> ?

But <S%G1161><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> ye may know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> hath <S%G2192><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%> to forgive <S%G863><s%> sins <S%G266><s%> , (he <S%G3004>saith<s%> to the sick of the <S%G3885>palsy<s%>,)

I say <S%G3004><s%> unto thee <S%G4671><s%> , Arise <S%G1453><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> take up <S%G142><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> bed <S%G2895><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> go thy way <S%G5217><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> thine <S%G4675><s%> house <S%G3624><s%> .

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2112>immediately<s%> he <S%G1453>arose<s%>, took <S%G142>up<s%> the <S%G2895>bed<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> went <S%G1831>forth<s%> <S%G1726>before<s%> them <S%G3956>all<s%>; insomuch <S%G5620>that<s%> they <S%G1839>were<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1839>amazed<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1392>glorified<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G3004%G3754>saying<s%>, <S%G1492>We<s%> <S%G3763>never<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> it on this <S%G3779>fashion<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he went <S%G1831>forth<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G3844>by<s%> the sea <S%G2281>side<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G2064>resorted<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G1321>taught<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> as he passed <S%G3855>by<s%>, he <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G3018>Levi<s%> the son of <S%G256>Alphaeus<s%> <S%G2521>sitting<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> the receipt of <S%G5058>custom<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, Follow <S%G190><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> . <S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G450>arose<s%> and <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> it came to <S%G1096>pass<s%>, <S%G1722>that<s%>, as <S%G846>Jesus<s%> sat at <S%G2621>meat<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3614>house<s%>, <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G5057>publicans<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G268>sinners<s%> <S%G4873>sat<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> together <S%G4873>with<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> there <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> when the <S%G1122>scribes<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2068>eat<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5057>publicans<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G268>sinners<s%>, they <S%G3004>said<s%> unto <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%>, <S%G5101>How<s%> is it <S%G3754>that<s%> he <S%G2068>eateth<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4095>drinketh<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5057>publicans<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G268>sinners<s%>?

<S%G2532>When<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> it, he <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, They that are whole <S%G2480><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> need <S%G5532><s%> of the physician <S%G2395><s%> , but <S%G235><s%> they that are <S%G2192><s%> sick <S%G2560><s%> : I came <S%G2064><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> to call <S%G2564><s%> the righteous <S%G1342><s%> , but <S%G235><s%> sinners <S%G268><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> repentance <S%G3341><s%> .

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> of <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G2258>used<s%> to <S%G3522>fast<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, Why <S%G1302%G3522>do<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> of <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G3522>fast<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G4674>thy<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3522>fast<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>?

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846%G3361>them<s%>, Can <S%G1410><s%> the children <S%G5207><s%> of the bridechamber <S%G3567><s%> fast <S%G3522><s%> , while <S%G1722%G3739><s%> the bridegroom <S%G3566><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> them <S%G846><s%> ? as long as <S%G3745%G5550><s%> they have <S%G2192><s%> the bridegroom <S%G3566><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> them <S%G1438><s%> , they cannot <S%G3756%G1410><s%> fast <S%G3522><s%> .

But <S%G1161><s%> the days <S%G2250><s%> will come <S%G2064><s%> , when <S%G3752><s%> the bridegroom <S%G3566><s%> shall be taken away <S%G522><s%> from <S%G575><s%> them <S%G846><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> shall they fast <S%G3522><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> those <S%G1565><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> .

No man <S%G3762><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> seweth <S%G1976><s%> a piece <S%G1915><s%> of new <S%G46><s%> cloth <S%G4470><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> an old <S%G3820><s%> garment <S%G2440><s%> : else <S%G1490><s%> the new piece <S%G2537><s%> that filled it up <S%G4138><s%> taketh away <S%G142><s%> from <S%G846><s%> the old <S%G3820><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> the rent <S%G4978><s%> is made <S%G1096><s%> worse <S%G5501><s%> .

And <S%G2532><s%> no man <S%G3762><s%> putteth <S%G906><s%> new <S%G3501><s%> wine <S%G3631><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> old <S%G3820><s%> bottles <S%G779><s%> : else <S%G1490><s%> the new <S%G3501><s%> wine <S%G3631><s%> doth burst <S%G4486><s%> the bottles <S%G779><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> the wine <S%G3631><s%> is spilled <S%G1632><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> the bottles <S%G779><s%> will be marred <S%G622><s%> : but <S%G235><s%> new <S%G3501><s%> wine <S%G3631><s%> must be put <S%G992><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> new <S%G2537><s%> bottles <S%G779><s%> .

<S%G2532>And<s%> it came to <S%G1096>pass<s%>, that <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G3899>went<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the corn <S%G4702>fields<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> the sabbath <S%G4521>day<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G756>began<s%>, as they <S%G3598%G4160>went<s%>, to <S%G5089>pluck<s%> the ears of <S%G4719>corn<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2396>Behold<s%>, <S%G5101>why<s%> do <S%G4160>they<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> the sabbath <S%G4521>day<s%> that <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G1832>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1832>lawful<s%>?

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, Have ye never <S%G3763><s%> read <S%G314><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> David <S%G1138><s%> did <S%G4160><s%> , when <S%G3753><s%> he had <S%G2192><s%> need <S%G5532><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> was an hungred <S%G3983><s%> , he <S%G846><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> they that were with <S%G3326><s%> him <S%G846><s%> ?

How <S%G4459><s%> he went <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the house <S%G3624><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> in the days <S%G1909><s%> of Abiathar <S%G8><s%> the high priest <S%G749><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> did eat <S%G5315><s%> the shewbread <S%G740%G4286><s%> , which <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G1832><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> lawful <S%G1832><s%> to eat <S%G5315><s%> but for <S%G1508><s%> the priests <S%G2409><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> to them which were <S%G5607><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> him <S%G846><s%> ?

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G3004>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, The sabbath <S%G4521><s%> was made <S%G1096><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> man <S%G444><s%> , and not <S%G3756><s%> man <S%G444><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> the sabbath <S%G4521><s%> :
Therefore <S%G5620><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> of the sabbath <S%G4521><s%> .
